messages.title: 5 Things to Remember
messages.content:
1. You don't need your polling card to vote
2. Polls are open 7am - 10pm
3. If you've got a postal vote, but haven't sent it back yet, you can take it to any polling station before 10pm
4. If you don't know where your polling station is or you need a lift to vote, call our campaign hotline on 01273 690274
5. Place a [X] next to your Labour candidates

messages.title: USE ALL YOUR VOTES FOR LABOUR
messages.content:
Vote once for your Labour Parliamentary candidate
Vote 3 times for your local Labour Council candidates

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Boost the NHS. Guaranteed GP appointments in 48 hours paid for by targeting tax avoiders
Help working parents with 25 hours a week free childcare for 3-4 year olds
Take on the energy firms with a freeze on household fuel bills
Longer tenancies, ban rip-off agents' fees and scrap the Bedroom Tax
Ban exploitative zero-hours contracts and campaign for a living wage

mentions.tacticalSituation: 2010 General Election results for Brighton Kemptown and Peacehaven

issues.health: Invest in the NHS and other public services like the Fire Brigade

housing.content: Longer tenancies, ban rip-off agents' fees and scrap the Bedroom Tax

quotes.text: A local, vocal MP for everyone in Brighton Kemptown and Peacehaven
Scrap the Bedroom tax and get serious about tackling tax dodgers
Stand up for young people, tenants, pensioners, parents and small businesses
Fight for what's right. For the many, not just the privileged few

images.caption: Polling day reminder and policies key
